name: Horny Recruiter
description:
Horny Recruiter is a visual novel-like interactive fiction game where you take the role of a “recruiter” of a multi-national tech company. You encounter various types of characters as “applicants” and must make appropriate decisions based on the criteria given by your manager. Of course, you’re free to do anything that you want!

The “interactive interview” mechanics of the game are all customized to their characters. Each character is designed to produce their own bubble of lewd experience or further enhance the overall immersion of the game.

Horny Recruiter is a “choice-based fetish interactive interview” game that uses visual novel elements for progression and storytelling.

You go to work each day and interview a variety of applicants. Get to know them, their background, and their personality, and eventually decide whether to hire them or not.

However, some applicants will do literally anything to get a job in the company!
